comment: I'd have to disagree with the difficulty of finding out who's the victim and who isn't. Someone who's frustrated normally says some strong out-of-pocket content when venting to someone they trust, while someone who's staging frustration will try to step away from said out-of-pocket content to sound "innocent" if you will. That being said, Johnny's texts really don't reflect what he was planning to do. Most he did was vent to 2 close friends (maybe more) and just file for divorce when the marital bed got soiled, that being the straw that broke the camel's back. While Amber had an entire elaborate plan against him and actually went with it. Something to think about.
